name: Money, Money
description:
Direct your cash to a piggy bank by dragging and drawing paths for coins to fall down. Tackle challenging levels with inverted gravity, magical portals, and more in this casual puzzle game, inspired by the classic game "Sugar, Sugar". Contains 10 unique levels!

CONTROLS:

DRAW PATHLEFT CLICKINVERT GRAVITYSPACE

CREDITS:

  • Sumanta Das - Programmer
  • Daniel Elwell - Programmer + Artist
